attributes.action: Have A FULL election for the public before allowing Gordon Brown a scot to become the prime minister for England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the people who voted Labour voted for Tony Blair, not for Gordon Brown or any other Labour person. Not only this but Gordon Brown is a scot, and as Scotland have there own parliment i believe it to be entirely unfair to have a scottish leader of a british country.The country should decide not a bunch of politicians.It is our country and should be treated as such.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
